section.title: KakaoTalk needed!
section.content: In order to confirm your reservation and further notice about land LIVE+ tour, you need to have a valid KakaoTalk account.

section.title: Book, book, book!
section.content: You can book as many Live tour as you want, so please watch, ask and decide the best real estate worth leg working.
